source.name: Findings From Fire Inspections
source.description: The purpose of this study data is to provide a metric with which to assess the effectiveness of improvements to the U.S. NRC's fire protection regulations in support of Task #5, "Assess Regulatory Effectiveness" of SECY-08-0171 "Plan for Stabilizing Fire Protection Regulatory Infrastructure." The staff trended the number of plant fire protection inspection findings identified in the past nine years that are classified in the Reactor Oversight Process (ROP) as Green or Greater than Green (White/Yellow/Red), normalized by the number of operating reactors inspected.
